message.raw:
Now compiles labscript files! Prints their output to the output box as they run, errors in red, and stops if one of them doesn't compile. If any of the things that happen when you click the go button doesn't work out, the whole thing stops and you're asked whether you want to delete the unused hdf5 files.

OK, now once I fix that bug where you can't add and remove globals without the GUI elements overlapping each other, we'll be set! (Not a hard fix, just a boring one which I left til last)

The we gotta work out the network interface with LabVIEW.
